content.raw:
Several changes on 4fb7145. Locally the test passed 50 times in a row.

* Some of the problems came from storing a vector of Qt pointers and deleting them, so I removed the vector and used the Qt API to access widgets instead.

* There were also occasional crashes related to the mutex. I changed it to std and the crashes disappeared.

* I used a hack to clear the layout, I'm open to alternatives.
content.html:
Several changes on 4fb7145. Locally the test passed 50 times in a row.

  • Some of the problems came from storing a vector of Qt pointers and deleting them, so I removed the vector and used the Qt API to access widgets instead.

  • There were also occasional crashes related to the mutex. I changed it to std and the crashes disappeared.

  • I used a hack to clear the layout, I'm open to alternatives.
